region_name.title: region_name
region_name.description: The region into which you want to launch the instance.

instance_type_name.title: instance_type_name
instance_type_name.description:
The type of instance you want to launch. To retrieve a list of available instance types, see
[List available instance types](#get-/api/v1/instance-types).

ssh_key_names.title: ssh_key_names
ssh_key_names.description:
The names of the SSH keys you want to use to provide access to the instance.
Currently, exactly one SSH key must be specified.

file_system_names.title: file_system_names
file_system_names.description:
The names of the filesystems you want to attach to the instance.
Currently, you can attach only one filesystem during instance creation.
By default, no filesystems are attached.

name.title: name
name.description: The name you want to assign to your instance. Must be 64 characters or fewer.

anyOf.title: ImageSpecificationID
anyOf.description: Specifies the image to use by its unique identifier.

family.title: family
family.description: The family name of the image.

anyOf.title: ImageSpecificationFamily
anyOf.description: Specifies the image to use by its family name.

image.title: image
image.description: The machine image you want to use. Defaults to the latest Lambda Stack image.

user_data.title: user_data
user_data.description:
An instance configuration string specified in a valid
[cloud-init user-data](https://cloudinit.readthedocs.io/en/latest/explanation/format.html)
format. You can use this field to configure your instance on launch. The
user data string must be plain text and cannot exceed 1MB in size.
